results.title: Effect in bronchial asthma of a new beta-adrenergic blocking drug atenolol (ICI 66, 082).
results.text_hl: The bronchial effect of intravenous @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@ICI 66.082@@@) has been studied in a double-blind cross over trial in 10 @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with pronounced, labile @<m>DISEASE_Bronchial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001982 @@@bronchial asthama@@@.

citations.NLM: Boye NP, Vale JR. Effect in bronchial asthma of a new beta-adrenergic blocking drug atenolol (ICI 66, 082). Eur J Clin Pharmacol. 1977;11(1):11-4. PMID: 319006
citations.BibTeX: @article{319006, title={Effect in bronchial asthma of a new beta-adrenergic blocking drug atenolol (ICI 66, 082).}, author={Boye NP and Vale JR}, journal={Eur J Clin Pharmacol}, volume={11}, number={1}, pages={11-4}}

results.title: [Possibilities of using cardioselective beta blocking agents in patients with chronic obstructive bronchopneumopathies].
results.text_hl: Of the 4 drugs the only possible one for use in this @SPECIES_9606 @@@patient@@@ category was @<m>CHEMICAL_Atenolol</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D001262 @@@atenolol@@@ which produced significant @<m>DISEASE_Bronchial_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001982 @@@bronchial dilation@@@ after spray treatment, thus demonstrating the responsiveness of beta 2-receptors to pharmacological stimulus.

citations.NLM: Giorgis GE, Galietti F, Miravalle C, Barberis S, Massaglia GM, Onoscuri E. [Possibilities of using cardioselective beta blocking agents in patients with chronic obstructive bronchopneumopathies]. Minerva Med. 1986 Jun 23;77(26):1255-8. PMID: 2873530
citations.BibTeX: @article{2873530, title={[Possibilities of using cardioselective beta blocking agents in patients with chronic obstructive bronchopneumopathies].}, author={Giorgis GE and Galietti F and Miravalle C and Barberis S and Massaglia GM and Onoscuri E}, journal={Minerva Med}, volume={77}, number={26}, pages={1255-8}}
